extension_description.message: An add-on with built-in light and dark themes that can be switched with one click. Keyboard shortcuts (default): 𝗪𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄𝘀/𝗺𝗮𝗰𝗢𝗦 → 𝐂𝐭𝐫𝐥/𝗖𝗺𝗱 + 𝐒𝐡𝐢𝐟𝐭 + 𝗦𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲

notification_text.message:
You can switch your browser themes
with the hotkeys:
𝗪𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄𝘀 → 𝐂𝐭𝐫𝐥 + 𝐒𝐡𝐢𝐟𝐭 + 𝗦𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲
𝗺𝗮𝗰𝗢𝗦 → 𝗖𝗺𝗱 + 𝐒𝐡𝐢𝐟𝐭 + 𝗦𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲
